title: Simple
desc: We only focus on doing one thing well and keeping things as simple as possible.

title: Get Going Fast
desc: Try out the API for FREE and then sign up with your GitHub account and Stripe.

title: Cost Effective
desc: Building on top of serverless functions means you'll only pay for the API calls you actually use.

title: Documentation
desc: Thorough docs that come with easy-to-use examples for many common programming languages.

title: Robust
desc: Serverless functions enable new levels of scalability and robustness against spikes in traffic.

title: Versioned
desc: All APIs are immutable and newer versions are always opt-in.

title: Trusted
desc: Our team has worked at some of the largest tech companies in the world including Facebook, Microsoft, and Netflix.

title: Secure
desc: We take security very seriously. All of our APIs are vetted by an independent third-party for compliance.

title: Support
desc: In addition to standard email support, we offer an integration with GitHub issues as well as an extensive FAQ.

title: Enterprise
desc: For questions regarding bulk pricing, dedicated support, customization, self-hosting, or other enterprise considerations, please contact us below.
